scenario_text.value:
Hey, Dracumon! I thought you said you were
gonna mop the floor or something!

Yeesh, these guys ain’t making it as easy as
I thought they would.

You think saying sorry’s gonna make
a difference here?!
Damn, if only I had more power!

At this rate I ain’t gonna protect Miu, much
less my own skin!
Then whaddaya gonna do about it?
Friggin’ what?

You don’t got the power, so you just gonna
give up or what?

That ain’t funny, even as a joke! No way I’m
gonna give up!

I’ll protect Miu. And I’ll grab hold of any
power I can to do that!

Heh, that’s a risky way of thinking. Still,
I like your spirit!
Kaito... Urgh! Ack! Gah!
Dracumon?! Wait...don’t tell me...!

Ungh... Kaito, if that’s... If your heart’s
the real deal...

If those feelings⁠—wanting to protect the
girl you hold dear⁠—are the real deal...
Then I gotta answer in kind!
Uwooooooh!
That form... What happened to you?!
We can talk later. Now, let’s try that again!

I’ll show you the new power you’ve grasped...
The power of Vamdemon!
